reuters.title: U.S. FEED SITUATION SUMMARY REPORT DELAYED
reuters.body: The U.S. Agriculture Department said its summary report on the Feed Situation and Outlook, scheduled for release April 24, has been delayed until May 15. The department said the delay will enable analysts to incorporate into the report USDA's first supply and demand estimates for the 1987/88 marketing year and data on farm program participation. Reuter 
